author: arkurth
msg: Added check to Windows.pm::get_cygwin_unix_file_path to make sure file path argument contains a slash and/or colon before attempting to execute cygpath.exe. Unnecessary warnings were being generated if a simple file name was passed.

msg: Rollback PIG-4412: Race condition in writing multiple outputs from STREAM op
